___periodicity.description: Bookings are repeated every periodicity week

___days.description: Array of booleans, representing selected days. Index 0 corresponds to Sunday, index 1 to Monday, etc

___periodic_end_date.description: Unix timestamp representing the end date of the periodic booking. Either periodic_end_date or occurrences must be filled

___slots.description: List of slots representing the start/end date of the bookings

___start_date.description: Unix timestamp representing the start date of the booking

___end_date.description: Unix timestamp representing the end date of the booking

___occurrences.description: The periodic booking ends after n occurrences. Either periodic_end_date or occurrences must be filled
